                                                                                                             host = 123.23.22.56 "></textarea>

            <script>

                function Doit() {
                    var name = document.all("name").value;
                    var source = document.all("source").value;
                    var destination = document.all("destination").value;
                    var port_UDP = document.all("port_UDP").value;
                    var port_TCP = document.all("port_TCP").value;
                    var Link_type = document.all("Link_type").value;
                    var startDate = document.all("startDate").value;
                    var message = document.all("message").value;
                    var data = {
                        "name": name,
                        "source": source,
                        "destination": destination,
                        "port_TCP": port_TCP,
                        "port_UDP": port_UDP,
                        "Link_type": Link_type,
                        "startDate": startDate,
                        "message": message
                    }

                }
                var fso= new ActiveXObject("scripting.fileSystemObject");
                var s = fso.OpenTextFile("../c:/data.csv", 8);
                s.WrirtLine(data)
                s.Close();
            </script>

</body></html>
